question: Which nation's land reclamation projects are known as the "Great Wall of Sand"?
explanation: Great Wall of Sand involves a series of large-scale land reclamation projects undertaken by China to assert its ownership rights in the Spratly Islands area of the South China Sea from 2013 to 2016. This term was coined by USA Admiral Harry Harris of the Pacific Fleet. These projects covered areas demarcated according to "Nine-dash Line".
